title: Use react-native-fast-image for remote images
body:
In stickers and in extensions we load remote images and react native image works not perfect, react-native-fast-image has much better performance and better to use it for remote images

https://github.com/DylanVann/react-native-fast-image

Issue Status: 1. **Open** 2. Started 3. Submitted 4. Done
__This issue now has a funding of 80.0 DAI (80.0 USD @ $1.0/DAI) attached to it.__ * If you would like to work on this issue you can 'start work' [on the Gitcoin Issue Details page](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/7633/3032). * Want to chip in? Add your own contribution [here](https://gitcoin.co/issue/status-im/status-react/7633/3032). * Questions? Checkout Gitcoin Help or the Gitcoin Slack * $85,064.39 more funded OSS Work available on the [Gitcoin Issue Explorer](https://gitcoin.co/explorer)

@StatusSceptre any update here? @yenda should I create a PR and start work until I get approved?

@shamardy yes
@flexsurfer please find someone to approve him
Hey @yenda and @flexsurfer - @shamardy has been approved.
